title: Cyberpunk Heist Adventure #21
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Corporate Server Room
rooms.description: A cold room filled with humming server racks bathed in blue LED light. Cable bundles snake across the floor. The air conditioning hums loudly. Holographic displays flicker with streams of encrypted data. A heavy security door blocks the exit north.

items.name: server rack alpha
items.description: A tall rack of blade servers with blinking status lights

items.name: maintenance tablet
items.description: A ruggedized tablet with system logs and notes
items.text: MAINTENANCE LOG: Server room access code is based on the founding year of NeoTech Corporation. Check the corporate history display. Remember: Lead Engineer is Kai Nakamura, Chief Security Officer is Sarah Martinez, and the backup data is stored in the Quantum Vault.

items.name: technician workstation
items.description: A cluttered desk with multiple monitors and a locked drawer unit

items.name: corporate memo
items.description: An official company document on digital paper
items.text: MEMO TO ALL STAFF: NeoTech Corporation was founded in 2077 during the height of the cybernetic revolution. Our commitment to innovation remains unchanged. All personnel must update their security credentials by end of quarter.

items.name: blue access keycard
items.description: A plastic keycard with a magnetic strip and NeoTech logo

items.name: corporate history display
items.description: A holographic display showing company milestones and achievements
items.text: NeoTech Corporation Timeline: Founded 2077 by visionary technologists. 2080 - First neural interface released. 2085 - Quantum computing breakthrough. 2090 - Global expansion complete. Leading the future of human augmentation.

items.name: equipment supply locker
items.description: A metal locker containing various tools and equipment

items.name: encrypted data drive
items.description: A small storage device with classified information
items.text: CLASSIFIED: Project Nightfall credentials - Username: GHOST_PROTOCOL - Password: NEON_SHADOW - The Quantum Vault contains the master encryption keys for all corporate data.

items.name: reinforced security door
items.description: A heavy door with a biometric scanner and keycard reader

rooms.name: Security Control Hub
rooms.description: A dimly lit command center with walls of monitors displaying security camera feeds. Neon strips pulse along the edges of the room. A central console glows with active alerts. The smell of ozone and energy drinks fills the air. A massive vault door dominates the east wall.

items.name: main security console
items.description: A sophisticated control panel with multiple screens and input devices

items.name: security protocol manual
items.description: A digital manual outlining security procedures
items.text: SECURITY PROTOCOLS: Vault access requires three-factor authentication. Personnel must correctly identify: 1) Lead Engineer name, 2) Backup storage location, 3) Chief Security Officer name. Failure results in lockdown and alert to armed response team.

items.name: surveillance monitor array
items.description: Dozens of screens showing various areas of the facility
items.text: Camera feeds show: Server Room (clear), Executive Offices (empty), Quantum Vault (sealed), Rooftop Helipad (one aircraft standing by). All systems nominal.

items.name: personnel filing cabinet
items.description: A cabinet containing employee records and profiles

items.name: file for Kai Nakamura
items.description: Personnel record for the lead engineer
items.text: EMPLOYEE RECORD: Kai Nakamura - Lead Engineer, Neural Systems Division. Clearance Level: Omega. Specialization: Quantum computing architecture and neural interface design. Years of service: 8.

items.name: file for Sarah Martinez
items.description: Personnel record for the security chief
items.text: EMPLOYEE RECORD: Sarah Martinez - Chief Security Officer. Clearance Level: Alpha-Prime. Former military cybersecurity specialist. Responsible for all facility security protocols and armed response coordination.

items.name: break room coffee station
items.description: A small area with a coffee maker and scattered energy drink cans

items.name: sticky note
items.description: A note scrawled in hasty handwriting
items.text: Reminder: The vault authentication answers are in the maintenance tablet and security manual. Also, Project Nightfall login is on that encrypted drive in the server room locker.

items.name: quantum vault door
items.description: A massive reinforced door with a holographic authentication interface displaying three security questions

password_questions.question: Enter Lead Engineer name:
password_questions.hint: Check the maintenance tablet and personnel files

password_questions.question: Enter backup storage location:
password_questions.hint: The maintenance tablet mentions where backup data is stored

password_questions.question: Enter Chief Security Officer name:
password_questions.hint: Look through the personnel files in the cabinet

rooms.name: Quantum Data Core
rooms.description: You have breached the inner sanctum! A massive quantum computer core pulses with ethereal blue light in the center of the chamber. Holographic data streams swirl through the air like digital auroras. Server towers line the walls, their lights blinking in hypnotic patterns. A terminal displays the words ACCESS GRANTED - DATA EXTRACTION COMPLETE.

items.name: central quantum processor
items.description: The heart of NeoTech's computing power, a marvel of technology worth billions

items.name: master data terminal
items.description: The primary access point for all corporate secrets and classified projects
items.text: SYSTEM STATUS: All encryption bypassed. Project Nightfall files downloaded. Corporate financial records acquired. Neural interface schematics copied. Extraction successful.

items.name: floating holographic interface
items.description: A three-dimensional display showing the stolen data being transferred to your device

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You have infiltrated NeoTech Corporation and extracted their most valuable data. The quantum vault has been breached, and terabytes of classified information are now in your possession. Time to jack out and disappear into the neon-lit streets before security realizes what happened. The heist is complete. You win!
